energeticgoose.name: Energetic Goose - AI-powered on-chain invoice financing platform
energeticgoose.description: Energetic Goose is an on-chain treasury and liquidity platform that tokenizes energy invoices into digital assets, uses AI for automated underwriting, and enables instant global payments and yield optimization through blockchain-based stablecoin finance.

durin.name: Durin - Global cross-border credit and underwriting platform.
durin.description: Durin is a global risk-hedging and underwriting platform that connects users’ verified financial data worldwide to build U.S.-equivalent credit profiles, enabling cross-border credit evaluation and compliance-driven underwriting for digital banks.

saferun.name: SafeRun - visualizes cyber threats through animated AI guardians.
saferun.description: SafeRun transforms traditional cybersecurity dashboards into living, story-driven experiences. It visualizes real-time threats through animated AI guardians — from calm cats to defensive mecha dogs — blending game design with serious security analytics. By turning complex data into intuitive motion and narrative, SafeRun makes cyber defense both clear and captivating.

memora.name: SafeRun - Ask your life, get the proof
memora.description: Memora lets you ask any life-admin question by voice and get a concise answer plus the exact proof (PDFs, photos, notes). It highlights the supporting snippet, shows evidence thumbnails, and can set follow-ups (e.g., reminders before expiration). All data stays private by default.

elucidate.name: Elucidate - Real-time Translation Chrome Extension based on knowledge level
elucidate.description: Built a functional Chrome Extension that can offer real values to those learning a new language and those with limited general reading proficiency.

math585.name: MERN Stack ChatGPT Clone
math585.description: Cloned ChatGPT using full-stack MERN framework that can summarize, rephrase, and translate the context.

xref.name: Xref - Cross Reference tool for Professor to find students
xref.description: Led a team of 5 to build Xref, which is a full-stack cross reference platform that helps professors to track students easily, it allows uploading CSV files, manually adding student's information, and searching student based on information.

note.name: Simple Note
note.description: Developed a simple note full-stack web application using Django and React framework.

camera.name: Camera Algorithms - Intern at Vivo as a Software Engineer
camera.description: This is my internship report at Vivo, where I was in a Software Engineer position and built the platform for camera's automation testing and implemented several carema algorithms.

RNN-stock.name: Neural Network to Predict Survival with Titantic
RNN-stock.description: Predicted the survival factors(passanger id, name, cabin, fare, etc.) of Titanic with Neural Network.

penalizedRegression.name: Penalized Regression with the Ames Housing Data
penalizedRegression.description: Found the best tuning parameter values through cross-validation and display these values and make prediction on the testing data, report the RMSE and the Coefficient of Determination R2

randomForest.name: Random Forest with the Spam Data
randomForest.description: Split the data randomly into training (75%) and testing (25%), first build the best random forest to predict Spam e-mails using the training data, then use the out-of-bag (OOB) data to measure its performance, and then use this random forest model to predict whether each e-mail in the testing data is Spam or not.

logisticRegression.name: Logistic Regression
logisticRegression.description: Used all the other 8 variables to predict the binary dependent variable 'diabetes' telling us whether the subject is diabetic or not (factor with 2 levels: neg and pos). You will split the data into 80% training and 20% testing.

eceRISC.name: RISC Game
eceRISC.description: Built a full-stack strategy game that allows multiple players play together.

battleship.name: Battleship Game
battleship.description: Built a full-stack web application called Battleship Game, which allows two players and one server. Players can move, attack, and perform sonar scan.

travelingapp.name: Traveling App
travelingapp.description: Built a traveling app that tested on IOS The advantage of this application is that it can give you all the recommendations for Restaurants, Attractions, and Hotels separately within one search each. (Search based on Google Map API)

capCup.name: Ice-cream is Melting before Eating
capCup.description: This is a prototype built in EST106 to solve the problem of ice cream is easy to melt. This idea won the most vote at EST106 class.

mobike.name: Mobike User Portrait Analysis
mobike.description: This is a Business Analysis Project for drawing the protrait of Mobike.
